member.name: T:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JavaScript
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JavaScript.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JavaScript.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JavaScript.loadjQuery
M:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JQueryExtensions.JQuerySelect``1(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.BrowserWindow,System.String)
member.summary: Runs a jQuery selector and returns the result
member.typeparam: The type of object the result should be cast to.
member.returns: An enumerable of the specified type.

member.name: M:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JQueryExtensions.JQueryExists(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.BrowserWindow,System.String)
member.summary: Return true if selector returns any elements
member.example:
Returns true if there is an element on the page that has the id of 'divExistTrueTest'
Browser.JQueryExists("#divExistTrueTest");

member.name: M:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JQueryExtensions.JQueryWaitForExists(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.BrowserWindow,System.String)
member.summary: Waits 10 Seconds for an element to exist. If no element exists after 10 seconds it will return false.
member.remarks: Will block until element exists or timeout reached.

member.name: M:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JQueryExtensions.JQueryWaitForExists(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.BrowserWindow,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits N milliseconds for an element to exist. If no element exists after N milliseconds it will return false.
member.remarks: Will block until element exists or timeout reached.
member.param: The timeout in milliseconds to wait.

member.name: M:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JQueryExtensions.JQueryWaitForNotExists(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.BrowserWindow,System.String)
member.summary: Waits 10 Seconds for an element to not exist. If element still exists after 10 seconds it will return false.
member.remarks: Will block until element exists or timeout reached.

member.name: M:CodedUI.jQueryExtensions.JQueryExtensions.JQueryWaitForNotExists(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.BrowserWindow,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits N milliseconds for an element to not exist. If element still exists after N milliseconds it will return false.
member.remarks: Will block until doesn't element exists or timeout reached.
member.param: The timeout in milliseconds to wait.
